Description: Heavy rains caused flooding in several low-lying areas of Bangalore.
A major landslide in the outskirts disrupted traffic and caused damage.
Public protests led to road closures and traffic disruptions in the city.
The impact of Cyclone Amphan resulted in strong winds and power outages.
A large-scale industrial fire led to evacuations and environmental concerns.
An extreme heatwave with temperatures exceeding 42Â°C affected the city.
Heavy monsoon rains caused significant flooding in parts of Bangalore.
A major traffic accident on a busy highway resulted in casualties.
A moderate earthquake with a magnitude of 4.8 shook the city.
A building collapse at a construction site caused casualties and chaos.
